alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 16 at 7:15AM CST until December 16 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. The higher amounts will be most likely over the eastern part of the county including Shaw, Fairbanks, and Brimson. * WHERE...Central St. Louis County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Bois Forte Band, Lake Vermilion area. * WHEN...Until 10 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
